original_title: Combat Jiu Jitsu Worlds 2021: The Featherweights
overview: The featherweights battle it out to find out who will be the Combat Jiu Jitsu World Champion.  Also, several superfights, including Donald Cerrone vs Craig Jones and Urijah Faber vs Elias Anderson.
title: Combat Jiu Jitsu Worlds 2021: The Featherweights
